text: Douglas R. Worsnop is an American atmosphere and hydrospheric scientist, a significant figure in his field, currently at Aerodyne Research and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:American atmospheric scientists Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Doug Worsnop
